item.title: Danke Seb
item.description: TL;DR: Sebastian Vettel has retired from Formula One and I am very sad. To give you some perspective, I started watching Formula One after the summer break of the 2018 season. Being a new follower of the sport, I was busy learning and remembering names, rules and concepts that were being thrown my way. As the season progressed towards the finale, I couldn’t help but naturally get drawn to two drivers: Charles Leclerc and Sebastian Vettel.
